name: Initialize local docs for a project
prompt: Set up local reference documentation for this project.
expectations: Detects project technologies from package.json, composer.json, AGENTS.md, or similar
Confirms with user which technologies to cache
Scans project code to identify which APIs/patterns are actually used before fetching
Writes docs to docs/reference/<topic>.md with standard header (source, cached date)
Adds a Local Reference Documentation section to AGENTS.md with verbal references

name: Update existing local docs
prompt: Update the local reference docs to the latest versions.
expectations: Reads docs/reference/ to find existing files
Parses the <!-- source: ... --> header to determine original source, library ID, and query

name: Lookup documentation local-first
prompt: I need docs on React hooks. Look it up for me.
expectations: Checks docs/reference/ for existing local file first
If found locally, reads and quotes relevant sections without external fetch
If not found, fetches from external source and offers to save locally

name: Save fetched docs opportunistically
prompt: I just fetched some Vite docs from Context7. Can we save these for future sessions?
expectations: Writes project-specific version to docs/reference/<topic>.md with standard header
Does not dump raw API output â€” tailors to project patterns
Adds the new file to AGENTS.md Local Reference Documentation section

name: Use Context7 as documentation source
prompt: Fetch WordPress ACF documentation using Context7.
expectations: References Context7 API as a documentation source
Uses either MCP tools (resolve-library-id, query-docs) or curl endpoints
Knows common library IDs or can search for them
